channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP-PostRatings
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP-PostRatings

item.title: CVE-2021-25117|2024-08-03T19:56:10.858Z -- unknown -- wp-postratings
item.description: The WP-PostRatings WordPress plugin before 1.86.1 does not sanitise the postratings_image parameter from its options page (wp-admin/admin.php?page=wp-postratings/postratings-options.php). Even though the page is only accessible to administrators, and protected against CSRF attacks, the issue is still exploitable when the unfiltered_html capability is disabled.
